consignment.translation[0].definitions[0: a quantity of goods that are sent somewhere, especially in order to be sold
consignment.translation[0].definitions[1: when someone sends or delivers something
consignment.translation[1].definitions[0: a quantity of goods delivered at the same time
Sixty eggs are removed from each consignment and tested for salmonella.
A large consignment of weapons was unloaded from the ship.
consignment.translation[1].definitions[1: goods given to someone acting for the owner, who must either sell them or return them to the owner
Instead of selling him your goods, you can let him have them on consignment. This means he gets physical possession of the goods but you keep legal title.
